meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Slender</kanji> and <kanji>thin</kanji> things are very <vocabulary>delicate</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>dainty</vocabulary>. They're easily broken, so you have to be careful.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
